name: Iron Mountain (Nanor Bogin)
description:
A short adventure as a fox. This was originally made for the BowersIndustry Christmas Jam,  but has since been updated with a complete soundtrack and a (somewhat) complete story. 

Controls:

 Z- A Button

X- B Button 

Arrows keys for movement

Shift- Select Button

The 1-bit GB Studio Logo was made by Filipe (a person in the gbstudio discord who let me borrow it). 

Thanks for playing! If you enjoyed it, please follow me for more updates and/or games in the future.
